website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, surgical-grade masks for protection from germs and irritants. The pack of 100 is a great value.
pros: Breathable fabric is effective yet light
Suitable for protection from dust, pollen, and other irritants
cons: Occasional complaints of gaps and discomfort while wearing the mask
Some complaints about the mask having a chemical smell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, easy to wear. Just an FYI...I was an operating room nurse for most of my career and we were instructed to wear masks for 2 hours and then dispose. As we breathe, the moisture from our airway dampens the mask and acts as a wick, drawing things in, rather than protecting us.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A.

customer_reviews.title: Product packaged like made by ***unknown*** and sold by ***unknown***
customer_reviews.text: The product is in plain cellophane packages -- I cannot find any information about manufacturer, distributor, trademark, etc. The only informative part on the package is a 1"X2" printed label which contains the following content: (1) 1st line: "Made in China" (2) 2nd & 3rd line: a Bar code and a string formatted like some code word; (3) last line: "Disposable masks" -- That is ALL I found about the product!!! To me, this product is made by ***unknown*** and sold by ***unknown***. No clue why "FDA" is included in the product picture -- I cannot find it anywhere in the package.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Have a strong chemical odor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I work with chemicals and let me tell ya I think these mask have been soaked in some sort of chemicals. I have never had any that smelled like chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: masks 100, FDA approved
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the masks are wrapped 10 to a bag, and ziplocked in a larger bag for 100. My hands are VERY clumsy, arthritic, etc. These straps fit normal and are easy to place over my ears.. just like hospital ones. I am extremely sensitive to most stuff especially chemicals, dye, smoke, sprays, etc. Have had this mask on an hour, smells normal/ mild and does not trigger my asthma, amazing! Thank you. I need these to help me stay well especially with viruses Jan/Feb if possible in waiting areas.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear outside when I'm doing yard work to help keep my allergies in check. They are as comfy as an item can be when it's looped around your ears and covering your mouth. The price is great for how many you get. And I keep my dreaded allergies at bay while still being able to work in the yard. I'm sure my husband would give this 5 million stars as I don't have the excuse of my allergies to get out of yard work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: cjashley

customer_reviews.title: FULL NOSE,MOUTH COVERAGE!
customer_reviews.text: A BUG FLEW IN MY THROAT WHILE WORKING (TRUCK DRIVER ). IT WON'T HAPPEN AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst masks ever.
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst masks. Too light weight, don't appear to be BBC triple ply as compared to other masks I have purchased, but worse of all, the band to hold it to the bridge of your nose is flimsy and leaves gaping holes where air escapes. WORTHLESS. You get what you pay for. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: FSSimon

customer_reviews.title: full bag
customer_reviews.text: Full bag, breathable and comfortable! Don't worry about your skin allergies
customer_reviews.author: nicloe

customer_reviews.title: Masks have a nauseating stench!
customer_reviews.text: Masks have a nauseating stench and I could not use it to cover my nose and mouth even for 5 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: PC@2019

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: This is fake products! Totally different from what described on listing, this is not surgical mask, no FDA remark on product, it’s just common mask. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Amoy

customer_reviews.title: FAKE MASKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: DONOT BUY THIS. IT'S FAKE!!! This mask only have 2 ply, missing the most important filter layer in the middle. Be careful, they are a lot of fake masks on Amazon now!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap mask
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap quality masks that do a decent job for allergy issues or mowing grass and their price was appropriate - normally 8.99. The last time I bought them in early 2019, I paid 5.99. On January 11th they were still 8.99. Now that there's a high demand for masks, they're going to jump the price up to 31.85? Not cool. That seems pretty exploitative and unethical.
customer_reviews.author: The4Ands

customer_reviews.title: Strange smell
customer_reviews.text: Mask fit is too small - and there is a strange odor on them that does not subside after opening
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be aware!
customer_reviews.text: This is made by third party from China. No manufacturer information, no product date, no product information at all!
customer_reviews.author: Juicy Juice

customer_reviews.title: Not surgical masks
customer_reviews.text: I bought them two months ago, when the masks price was at a normal range. On its introduction, it states itself as surgical masks. When they arrived, however, there were no where on the package showing they were surgical masks.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Barton

customer_reviews.title: Paid 10 dollars 8n JANUARY 2020
customer_reviews.text: I have always used these ones for my year-round allergies. I usually wear one when I am in the yard playing with my dogs. In JANUARY 2020 I paid 10 bucks for these masks. Fortunately, I stilk have a lot. Whoever is charging 40 dollars for them should be ( you fill the blanks)
customer_reviews.author: Co&Be

customer_reviews.title: Horrible seal
customer_reviews.text: These are most certainly not surgical grade masks. The seal is horrible around the entire mask. The metal strip at the top only covers the nose. Buy a different mask.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very bad quality of mask. Didn’t receive what it claims. It’s only 1 thin layer of cloth. Ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: This mask doesn't look like the picture at all! Not the same company!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. The shipment is fast but the quantity is low. Although I run some tests to prove it works and it has 3 layer, it is so thin that you can almost see through the outer water-proof layer. Shouldn't AMAZON punish these kind of behavior? Well, at least It's better than nothing. And I paid nearly 100 dollars for these 100 masks, which I only spent 12 dollars on January.
customer_reviews.author: zzihan

customer_reviews.title: Just know...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in December for use with a sick relative. Price was $8.99 - which is what is should be now.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest items I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 boxes and arrived today 01/29/2020. The quality is terribly bad! Boxes are loose the masks exposed. No seal on mask packages, no basic protection at all! Cheapest quality I have ever seen. No any information about product listed on the box. Must return to seller immediately.
customer_reviews.author: yan

customer_reviews.title: JUNK ALERT !!!
customer_reviews.text: very low quality...$99 store crap i doubt they filter out anything Somebody in China is laughing their way to the bank as they marvel how stupid Americans are and will buy any crap they send over here I’m sending these back the free masks they give out at the hospital are way better than these aluminum wire Strip that seals the mask around your nose feels like a thin piece of wire I have no idea how this product is rated over two stars there is something wrong here 😒
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A useful purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are so affordable, I can use them whenever I need them, whether I’m mowing the grass or spray painting something. I don’t feel like I need to reuse one to save money. When my son brought a cold virus home from school recently, I wish I had remembered I had these. Maybe we could have avoided most of us being sick & miserable! These masks are comfortable & there is an aluminum piece inside the top edge so that it can be shaped to your nose.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Straps break
customer_reviews.text: The straps break off for roughly 50% of the masks. These are poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Jacko A.

customer_reviews.title: 100 Pcs Disposable Earloop Face Masks (Blue) from India
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. I can't see 3-ply as seller claimed, only 2. Nose strip virtually useless, too soft, bendy. Should be able to offer some protection from dust and maybe virus. Not sure if it's right for covid-19.
customer_reviews.author: E&B

customer_reviews.title: Chemical odor and weak nose grip
customer_reviews.text: These masks stink of chemicals, kinda defeats the purpose of using a mask. Also the nose grip is weak so the mask slips up and hits me in the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Very economical. I use these a lot. Serves its purpose for cleaning, painting, dusting, etc. They do however, appear to have a slight odor when worn. That's why it received a 3 star rating from me. I just place a bounce sheet in bag with the masks so they all smell like fresh linen now. That alleviated my problem with the smell. Other than that, no real issue.
customer_reviews.author: SWAT

customer_reviews.title: Price Gouging
customer_reviews.text: Shame on you Amazon for allowing price gouging. Very flimsy. Can’t fit well around nose. Paid $69.99 plus tax for 100 pieces of junk!
customer_reviews.author: janetwinston

customer_reviews.title: 😎 Excellent product, wish I could find it for sale again
customer_reviews.text: I originally paid $7.99 for a pack of 100 of these masks. This was just prior to the Coronavirus outbreak. My original use case was to wear it while I am changing my cats litter box as the resulting dust always made me cough. For this purpose they work great. I've stopped using them for the cat litter and am keeping them for Coronavirus prevention. Well made and packaged, good price too if $7.99 😁
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Odor and Skin Irritation
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the package, the first thing I noticed was a chemical odor that when you put on the mask is overwhelming. So I decided to let some of them air out overnight and try it again. The odor did dissipate and I was able to wear one, but soon after I put it on, I noticed a mild burning sensation on my face. I tried to ignore it, but finally, could not any longer. I do not have sensitive skin in my opinion and am really disappointed because now I am going to have to spend more money. Also, there is NO company name anywhere on the packaging. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hubcitywriter

customer_reviews.title: They work great. Lol
customer_reviews.text: We use these as chicken diapers for in the house. They work great. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I brought these
customer_reviews.text: Last year I almost died because of the flu virus. I am so glad I brought these. I have some in a plastic bag in my purse and around my home. I work at home so I will use for my protection when the kids come to my daycare. I go to my place of worship often and will use it there too. It's comfortable and at least will provide me with some protection.
customer_reviews.author: A Personal Matter:  Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad!
customer_reviews.text: The masks shipped from China. They are very thin with no nose wire, and as someone already said, have weird odor. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Shinji

customer_reviews.title: Worth to Buy When Urgent
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered 100 pcs surgical masks and received in day 7, shipped from China Anhui The package I received is 20 pcs per bag not individual packages. Did the test, it is real, the surgical mask did cause static electricity and pick up the little papers which I made.
customer_reviews.author: iSiS

customer_reviews.title: Gaps around nose and sides
customer_reviews.text: These have gaps at the nose and on both sides of the cheeks (I saw that in the picture but just assumed it was the way the model was wearing it). The metal across the nose bridge wouldn’t stay tightly formed against my nose. I couldn’t get it to I’m wearing this while going through chemo so it is really important that the seal around my face be flush with my skin so that no germs get in. Wouldn’t recommend these when your health is on the line.
customer_reviews.author: Juneau

customer_reviews.title: Constantly adjusting mask = very annoying
customer_reviews.text: The wire at the top is too thin and doesn’t hold when you form it around your nose. As a result the mask was sliding down my face incessantly. I was constantly adjusting the mask to keep it positioned over my nose and mouth. The masks I were using the day before were from cvs and they were much better, although, the masks at the doctors office were another level above the cvs ones. So of the three masks I used over the past few days these were by far the worst and I think the two star rating is generous if anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley K.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and does not protect you. Useless. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These did not fit tight on my face, thus fail to keep pollen out.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor gave me a few masks to use for seasonal allergies and they worked great. I found these on Amazon, thinking they were the same as the ones from my doctor from what I could see from the pictures. Unfortunately these were not near the quality. The metal wire for the nose piece was nothing like the metal band on my doctors. The wire did not hold its shape very well. The mask overall did not fit tight against my face like my doctors mask did. Time to call my doctor and find the exact manufacturer and part number.
customer_reviews.author: Brent D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: UNcomfortable
customer_reviews.text: i live on 3rd floor in apt. and it's dusty in here-way more than first floor apt's. so i wanted to try a mask-to filter out the dust-it was 'very' uncomfortable and i kept trying to adjust it but i ended up tearing it and then, tearing it off-i was able to return them-good c.s.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Work, but wish they were better
customer_reviews.text: I have glasses and they do not fit properly to keep from steaming up the lenses. Other than that, they serve their purpose. Someone needs to make masks for those of us with glasses!
customer_reviews.author: cnh012

customer_reviews.title: Cheap masks, don’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Do not buy these. The metal wire along the top that helps keep the mask in place doesn’t go all the way across - I’m sure done to save on the cost. But it keeps the masks from being secure. So they’re pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Babbo

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit as well as the hospital version
customer_reviews.text: Story: I took my wife to the hospital because she had a cold/flu. They gave her a mask saying that she shouldn't spread germs. She said the mask fit great and wore it at home because she said the air was cold. We bought these to get her through the rest of the illness but she said the ear loops were flimsy and the nose-piece didn't fit tightly. I'll try another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality of before
customer_reviews.text: I bought these once last year before covid. They were really good quality. I bought some again and they aren't the same at all. They almost seen like paper and they fit funny. If I was rating the first package I would give them five stars. Second package one star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: These suck, the nose guard is flimsy and doesn’t stay formed around your nose , letting in toxins
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, cheap. I've thrown them, all out.
customer_reviews.text: The second you wrap these around your ear, they snap. The exact second or a few seconds after! The straps are glued down with the tiniest little adhesive drop and are barely connected to the mask. It's beyond a joke that they would even produce these. I tried to get a replacement from the seller. I was a few days over their 30-day return policy (I was going through other masks since these took about two months to receive) and they denied doing anything about it. Whoever thinks you would receive faulty/poorly made protective gear, of all things? Well, these guys have it, if you're in the market!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It's too thin, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S Collins

customer_reviews.title: Much too thin
customer_reviews.text: The masks look fine but are much too thin. I will have to wear two to have the thickness that other masks of the same type have. On 4-11-20, I paid $64.69 for 100, but now see that the price 5-16-20 on Amazon is $98.99. That's a big increase. That works out to about $2.00 per wearing, assuming you dispose of them after one use. They came 5-15-20, a little over a month past when I ordered them, albeit within the delivery window they gave me. I will keep looking for better masks. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B

customer_reviews.title: Slow delivery
customer_reviews.text: It took 7 weeks to be delivered; in fairness to the vendor they did Email me and state there would be a delay due to new quarantine requirements. The masks have a slight chemical and damp smell. I will put a used dryer sheet in the bag and see if that helps. The wire strip that goes across the top, does not pinch too well over your nose so if you have glasses on they will fog over. I had take the mask off and make 3 bends on the strip to get the mask conform to my nose and cheeks. But they do the job and are much needed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D Zych

customer_reviews.title: Ear straps break off easily!
customer_reviews.text: These disposable masks were expensive & work good as a disposable mask. The overall reviews that I saw rated the masks near perfect. That’s why I spent the extra money & the fact I received them quicker then other masks were expected to be delivered. I figured that’s why they were far more expensive than others & because they were better than others on Amazon. It’s important to use extreme care when putting the straps around your ears. The straps are just held on the mask with glue & break off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G. McCallum

customer_reviews.title: These masks are counterfeit, and offer no health benefits. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these masks because they appeared to be surgical procedure masks, and the description stated that the masks "...helps decrease the transmission of flu...". I saw that this product had 4.5 stars and over a thousand reviews and thought this must be a legitimate product. I was wrong. Unfortunately, there is no melt blown, non woven fabric in the middle. it's very flimsy. I will be notifiying my state's relevant authorities regarding the sale and shipment of counterfeit goods.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Just like in the doctor's office.
customer_reviews.text: We need to use these when we mow the lawn. They are just like the ones the doctor's office gives you during flu season. The cost is low enough we use one per mowing and it's helped greatly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Paper Thin - Do these evening protect?
customer_reviews.text: Way too thin. I don’t trust that it will protect. I’ve never had a mask this thin before. Gaps on sides. Nose area doesn’t conform snugly. Flimsy. Yes, it’s lightweight, but that’s because it’s like tiddue paper.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: I got baited by price and FCC logo. I will not buy anything from the seller and I will ignore the brand in the future. Perhaps people who reviewed the product don't know what is quality mask or maybe those paid reviews. Thank you, goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: rathernot

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep airborne dust out
customer_reviews.text: These are too porous compared to other brands I’ve used. I use masks in the barn to reduce dust inhalation. In just an hour the dust came through the inside layer. I could brush it off with a finger. Other masks don’t do this even after being worn for 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: CT Allers

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who had undergone major surgeries. His drs advised us to wear these when going out in public and for people coming into our hone. These worked out perfectly. Kept them by the front door so that friends and family had one on when stepping inside and for our son, every time we went out.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: Seems like decent masks. They are three layer. They come bundled five in a little plastic wrapper. The big problem with them is they have a chemical odor that isn't subtle. I won't wear them as I don't know the source of the odor (what chems) and therefore I can't be certain it isn't something harmful from some factory in China.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the mask...I use them when I’m using cleaning supplies. They’re effective and they’re comfortable. I also use when I go to the salon as the chemical smells irritate my sinuses. Thanks for a quality product and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful. I am on a medication that surpresses my immune system, so avoiding germs from others is vital. I use these not only while out, but when the grands come to visit and are sniffling and sneezing.
customer_reviews.author: The Lady Steffi

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping out pollen during yard work
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packaged and good quality. I use these for yard work as the pollen and dust really bothers me when I am outside stirring things up. The fit and construction was very good and it covered my face without hindering my breathing and it stayed in place. I would definitely repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: muffyjones

customer_reviews.title: great value, great product
customer_reviews.text: I do landscaping for a living and this protects debris,pollen,dust etc. It fits me great and it's also breathable. I thought it was going to cheaply made since its cheap , but went through first pack and none has broke yet. For the money I dont think I can find better, 5 stars, why not.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS WORTHLESS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: A DANGEROUS WORTHLESS PRODUCT THAT DOES NOT PROTECT YOU FROM ANY DUST PARTICLES.The manufacturers of this product know that it is absolutely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't use without closepin to make ear loops shorter.
customer_reviews.text: Ear lops are really large and the mask rides up into my eyes. Completely not useable as is.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality/bad filtering
customer_reviews.text: The first think to notice is how it does not fit around the nose. The material is not well made, it does not bend and hold shape to contour the face. Also I did a lighter test: blowing a lighter to see if I can blow it off. I compared these masks, a cloth mask I handmade from thick cotton fabric, and a surgical mask from a US hospital. The only mask that I could blow off the lighter through was this one. Do not buy. Wear a tshirt around your face.
customer_reviews.author: AnastasiaN

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and I tested the moisture protection by putting drops of water on the mask and let it sit there for 30 minutes, and it had never absorbed to the lining...Pass! The quality of the material looks fine and not thin, the elastic is pretty strong and the nose metal piece seem strong as well. However I am giving 3 stars for packaging since it came in cheap plastic bags and overall at 4 stars due to the long shipment. If this was in sealed bag would have bring up the packaging valued to at least a 4 stars. I purchased this back in April but I didn't pay $98
customer_reviews.author: Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Mask doesn’t stay put
customer_reviews.text: The mask rides up your face and into your eyes. You have to keep adjusting it to keep it out of your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. They fit fine and if they are too big you can tie a knot on the ear strap without any problem. Was not able to blow out a lighter. As for the chemical smell I do hang them up and let them air out for several days but lots of new things have a chemical smell. Just purchased another pack!
customer_reviews.author: s.r.

customer_reviews.title: Will reorder when necessary!
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight, easy to breathe with while they're on. I use them while I mow, when I am at Dr. or I'm sick and have to get out.
customer_reviews.author: catloverjenn

customer_reviews.title: Sickly Smell
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in family got sick from wearing these masks. Some threw up from the smell & others got headaches. Do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: behrman bee

customer_reviews.title: Pungent odor from the mask
customer_reviews.text: Strongly not recommend this product. When open it, weird smells from the mask, and the product is in low quality.. Stay away from this product or it might even hurt your health..
customer_reviews.author: Raineaf

customer_reviews.title: very expensive Masks
customer_reviews.text: Price gouged Great packaging Individually wrapped packages with 10 masks in each one, nice touch, sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: These are a waste of money. DO NOT BUY. I work in a restaurant and must wear a mask. Upon putting one on, the ear strap broke in 5 minutes. I went through almost all of them day 1. Way too expensive for such horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Two issues with this product. 1. The material is extremely thin. I used to work in hospitals and wore masks all of the time. This is not close to hospital grade disposable masks. 2. 25% of the elastic strings break off when I try to put them on my ears. Poor quality control. I have been using "double masks" when I use these.
customer_reviews.author: Howard C. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly. Great deal for the price. Nice to have on hand when I'm cleaning with chemicals, or when the kids get sick etc. Only complaint is that they do have a slight smell so I just opened all the packages up and let them air out, seemed to be find after that. But I'm curious what the smell was, it is a little concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Andrew

customer_reviews.title: A Decent Disposable Mask
customer_reviews.text: We received our first order even sooner than the first estimate. What we received was 2 plastic bags full of 50 masks each. No box, but, then, I didn't order them to get a box. The quality of the product is as good as any other disposable mask I've tried. The earloops are nice and soft. the nose clip is a little on the flimsy side, but it works to keep the mask from sliding down too far as you talk (every time my mouth opens, my whiskers grab the inside of any mask and pull it down a bit). Yes the price is higher than it was before the pandemic, but at least we can get these decent masks.
customer_reviews.author: Venturer

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have them
customer_reviews.text: The masks seem well made and are comfortable and they have a nose piece which makes a better fit. They came in two boxes of 50 each and within the box, they came in packages of 10. I really liked that so the others stay unopened and clean and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: kisha p

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: They are fine except for the fact that they smell terrible. I've had to hang them in the bathroom to air out. The smell is over-powering. Otherwise, they are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Segura

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this purchase. The packaging was a flimsy ziploc bag. The masks were nasty they smelled of mildew and moisture. They were not usable and there is no way for me to return them because it seems the shop had closed so I lost money on something I couldn't use.
customer_reviews.author: victoria mathis

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Didn't the cover 19 come from china- if I knew beforehand I would have not ordered them
customer_reviews.author: Kibe

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Our son is currently undergoing chemotherapy and radiation treatment for cancer. His immune system is very susceptible to germs at this time. We are asking any visitors to please wear a mask. These work well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stout

customer_reviews.title: The ear straps come un-glued making the mask useless
customer_reviews.text: They broke when wearing them, you find yourself unprotected. Since they come in packages of ten at first I thought it was just that one package but no I’m into the 4th package and they all broke on me. What a waste of money! I have now white glued two package but I don’t know if that will hold.
customer_reviews.author: BSD

customer_reviews.title: They Work, but They Could Be a Little Better
customer_reviews.text: They work like any other would work. The only problem I have with them is that the metal nose band they use in them is not very strong, and it causes them to lose shape VERY easily. This results, personally, to air blowing up through the top end of the mask, and drying out my eyes. I have to fiddle with masks constantly over the course of the day, just to keep my eyes from becoming irritated. Again, nevertheless, that's just me. If you just need a mask, and never had a problem with any others, then these will work just fine. I'll just deal.
customer_reviews.author: AirStyle120

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bad coughs!
customer_reviews.text: I had acute bronchitis and coughed & hacked for several weeks. These help me cover those coughs when around other people. Just what I needed! Pecfect size too.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaC

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Up until now, I have been under the impression that when Amazon labels something "Amazon's Choice, they are stating that they feel it provides the best value based upon quality and price. Unfortunately, this couldn't be further from the truth. These masks are not appropriate for social distancing as the material is not malleable and form-fitting and the wire at the top of the mask has no memory, and therefore, you can not get a tight fit over nose. Don't buy, save your money or you will have a broken heart.
customer_reviews.author: William M Murray

customer_reviews.title: It is a economic value mouth mask
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, it come with as the product description. What I have to comment that it was not individual packed. It come with 10 mask per pack. So, it is not very convenience to use for someone who is not daily carry a mouth mask. Finally, the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: eddy from hong kong

customer_reviews.title: Great wintertime protection against germy people!
customer_reviews.text: great coverage of nose (high on bridge) and down over the chin, even with a goatee. Great to protect yourself or protect others if you are sick and must go out. Very comfortable fit; couldn't tell it was on my ears after I put it on. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping & great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping & great quality for the price! This fit great and I do not need to spray down my glasses as they do not fog up. This work perfectly for my husband as he needs these for every job site. Candle blowing test was better than other brands & the fit is comfortable and not loose as others.
customer_reviews.author: franco.j

customer_reviews.title: Used to be 8.99
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in October for 8.99. Now they are 42. I understand raising the price a bit but this seems extreme.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R LaCroix

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wear and get on. DIdn't make it hard to breath and kept me from contaminating my sterile field. Sometimes metal bar for nose contour was a little short or in the wrong place. Masks also felt a little short vertically. If you need to keep things clean while working on a project these do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Carson

customer_reviews.title: Basic and what is needed
customer_reviews.text: It is a triple layer mask, which is necessary. The one thing about the mask is that it has a chemical smell, that is like a putty or more specifically "GAK" if you know of that product from Nickelodeon. It isn't a great thing to smell on the inside of a mask, but it isn't the end of the world. For $8 and for the effectiveness of the mask it is still not a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mmalisz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: None lasted more than a few minutes before the straps broke off. What a waste of money. Missed the return window since I had others at home but cheaply made and I am sure they know it.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, this is a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is O.K. with this product, except I wished that the nose piece was a little more sturdy. I have purchased this type product, off the shelf, in two different locations here in San Diego, and the nose piece was stronger. When I bent it to shape around my nose, it would be more stable, and would not move as much. Overall, these are O.K. for me, for what I use them for. I use them to prevent myself from getting sinus nasal infections. For over 20 years now, I have had very severe allergic sinusitis. Just about any type odor (pleasant or not) can almost instantly start me on the road to an infection in my nasal area.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Schlager

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is the best priced masks i have found they seem maybe a little small, but fit just fine and are as comfortable as you can excpect wearing a mask can be
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bought for plane travel and yard work
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition and is exactly as described. I needed a fresh supply for plane travel, visiting nursing homes and hospital, and yard work. Will definitely order from this company again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: S Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good price. Fast service
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my purposes and they arrived quickly. I am using these to prevent product contamination in my DIY concoctions as well as save my lungs when using fine particulate clay powders.
customer_reviews.author: DjDuLion

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a glass artist and I use these in my studio because of dust from ground-up glass. The ones that I had, use elastic to loop over the head & neck and were semi-rigid. Since I wear safety goggles, the nose area came up too high and was quite uncomfortable. With these, I can easily wear them with my safety goggles and still be comfortable which enables me to work longer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Honorable seller, but masks were mostly defective
customer_reviews.text: Our pack of 100 masks consisted of mostly defective ones. About 80% of the batch came apart within an hour of first use. The ear straps were not attached to the masks adequately. But the seller was honorable -- they gave me a full refund, so they get a couple of stars for that.
customer_reviews.author: DeaconMac

customer_reviews.title: Great price but tears easily
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this purchase was totally worth it. I do dislike how they were packaged because I bought this for my studio for clients and myself. When you take them out, they can get tangled and they tear easily. I wore to a wedding for a bridal party I was paid to do their makeup and the mask tore quickly. But for the price it was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Mia Frison

customer_reviews.title: they do the job
customer_reviews.text: I give then an okay over all. They do the job, but they smell a little funny, and a few of them have snapped the ear loops. other than that doing great
customer_reviews.author: jenna smith

customer_reviews.title: Facemasks, what's to say.
customer_reviews.text: Simple face masks that do the job. They are not n95 or true surgical facemarks, but they are not supposed to be. They are nice disposable face masks. They did have a bit of an oder from the manufacturing facility but after taking them out of the packaging and letting them air out, the oder went away.
customer_reviews.author: Hcetigol

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave two stars, but had to come back and change my review. The mask that was horrible was the one I paid $15 for 15 masks at CVS. When I bought the house it was under $40 for 100 masks, so for the price these are pretty good. The nose piece stays shaped, where as the other masks even after forcing the nose piece into position , unfolded. The ear loops are not snug, but the other masks were so loose that I had to tie knots in them to be able to wear them. Overall I am happier with these masks than I have been with any of the other ones I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

product_meta.title: Wecolor 100 Pcs Disposable 3 Ply Earloop Face Masks, Suitable for Home, School, Office and Outdoors (Blue)
feature_bullets: High quality: Disposable masks are made of premium non woven fabric, soft and comfortable, gentle to skin.
3-ply and Breathable: 3 ply layers can better block the small particles in air and filter it, reduce the mugginess for wearing mask.
Considerate design: embedded nose clip can help fit the nose bridge, reduce the fogging on the eyeglasses.
Elastic ear loop: high elastic ear loop, pose less press to ears and face, avoid the uncomfortableness from long-time use.
A must for personal and home: perfect personal care pack for daily use, for home and office, school and outdoors, service staff and personal needs. Best gift for family and friends.
